content.text: Doing well, I just finished sewing a dress for a friend's birthday party. How are you?
Doing well, I am about to take a hike with my brother in the woods.
That sounds relaxing, I love to go hiking in the woods.
I love it too, but I'm not always graceful and trip over my own feet. My kids find it hilarious.
I do that too! But my kids are too young to find it funny yet.
What do you do for work?
I'm a fashion designer, I love the creative process of designing and sewing my own clothes.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to learn how to sew.
You should! It's a lot of fun and you can make some really cool things.
I might have to look into it.
I'm sure you'd be great at it!
